__e: I was about to receive the body and blood of Christ our Savior!
I mean, how many people eat a fucking cracker and really believe that it's the body of Christ?
When you eat of His flesh and drink of His blood you will be at one with Him.
John Thomas, in the name of Christ our Lord I anoint thee with oil for thy safekeeping.
Let any man or woman with sin in their heart come forward to have that sin washed away by the grace of Jesus Christ Almighty.
You are welcome in the name of Christ.
Let me in! Will you shut up, for Christ sake!
What the hell are you doing here?
Open my heart by your Holy Spirit, for the sake of Jesus Christ. So that I may learn to repent my sins and to believe in Jesus, and every day to grow in holy life and living.
This is the blood of Christ.
The blood of Christ keep thee in eternal life.
Would it help you if I told you this wasn't wine but the blood of Christ?
